basics.name: Ethan Schaller
basics.label: Computer Programmer
basics.summary: I am a recent graduate from Nova Scotia Community College's IT Programming Course. I am eager to join the workforce and show my talents to the wider world.

education.institution: Nova Scotia Community Collage, Sydney, Nova Scotia
courses: Collaborated with other students in the design and planning of a new company to get experience with group work and setting up work plans.
Constructed a GUI for a pizza restaurant and a bank using Java to further my knowledge of Java and its GUI options.
Designed and integrated a user interface in the C++ language for a movie rental business to use to track movies and rentals.

work.summary: I was one of three main workers in the school's canteen tasked with running and maintaining the sales and stock.
highlights: Worked closely with others in a work environment to efficiently get work done.
Helped customers find what they were looking for, answered questions, and offered product advice to better the customerâ€™s experience.
Counted stock and reported profits keep the school informed of the success of the canteen.
Carried out day-day-day duties accurately and efficiently.
Demonstrated respect, friendliness, and willingness to help wherever needed.
